text:
e="preserve">Liliana Piera Marina Brescia Clerici, best known professionally as Liliana Ross, (March 30, 1939 – June 10, 2018) was an Italian-born Chilean actress, director, playwright, and theatrical producer. She was born in Genoa, Italy. Her career lasted for fifty years. She was best known for her starring roles in the Chilean telenovelas "La Colorina" (1977) and "Machos" (2003).
Ross died at her home in Santiago, Chile, on June 10, 2018 from complications of Alzheimer's disease, at the age of 79.
